statements: SELECT * FROM team_availability;
SELECT team_id, team_member, date FROM team_availability;
SELECT team_id, team_member, date, available_time_start FROM team_availability WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_availability WHERE date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT team_member, date, available_time_start, available_time_end FROM team_availability WHERE team_member LIKE 'John%';
SELECT team_id, team_member, date, available_time_start, available_time_end FROM team_availability WHERE team_member = 'John' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT team_member, team_id, available_time_start, available_time_end, date FROM team_availability WHERE team_member = 'Alice' ORDER BY team_member
SELECT team_member, team_id, date FROM team_availability WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'

SELECT team_member, team_id, available_time_start, available_time_end FROM team_availability WHERE available_time_start >= '09:00:00' AND available_time_end <= '17:00:00' ORDER BY team_id, available_time_start
SELECT * FROM team_availability WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND date >= '2022-03-01'
SELECT * FROM TeamMembers;
SELECT name, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, email FROM TeamMembers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT event_name, start_time, end_time FROM TeamSchedule WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name FROM TeamMembers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM TeamSchedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT id, event_name, start_time, end_time FROM TeamSchedule WHERE member_id = 123 ORDER BY start_time ASC, end_time DESC;
SELECT id, event_name, start_time, end_time FROM TeamSchedule WHERE member_id = 456 AND event_name LIKE '%Meeting%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE date = '2022-01-20';
SELECT member_id, position FROM team_members WHERE position = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM team_availability WHERE available = true ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, position, location FROM team_members ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT t.name, s.date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM team_members t JOIN team_schedule s ON t.member_id = s.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE date = '2022-07-15' AND end_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT t.name, a.date, a.available FROM team_members t JOIN team_availability a ON t.member_id = a.member_id WHERE a.available = true ORDER BY a.date ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-08-01' AND event_date <= '2022-08-31';
SELECT event_title, start_time, end_time FROM team_schedule ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC, member_role ASC
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager'
SELECT event_title, event_date, start_time FROM team_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC, start_time ASC
SELECT member_name, event_title, available FROM team_members JOIN team_availability ON team_members.member_id = team_availability.member_id WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM team_communication WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY sent_at DESC
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM team_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT member_email, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager' AND member_email LIKE '%@company.com%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_members FROM team_members;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, leave_start_date, leave_end_date FROM team_members JOIN team_leave ON team_members.member_id = team_leave.member_id;

SELECT team_communication.sender_id, team_communication.receiver_id, team_communication.message_content, team_members.member_name FROM team_communication JOIN team_members ON team_communication.sender_id = team_members.member_id;
